title: IBody2.CreateBlendSurface
description: Creates a constant radius rolling-ball blend surface (also known as a pipe surface) between two side surfaces.

remarks: The surface generated by this method is the path traced out when a sphere of the blend radius is rolled in contact with the two side surfaces. The center of the sphere rolls along the spine (the intersection of these two surfaces) when offset by the blend radius.
